documentation.text:
@title CRUDContract
 @dev A simple CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) contract for managing items.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct CRUDContract.Item storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct CRUDContract.Item storage ref[] storage pointer,struct CRUDContract.Item storage ref)

documentation.text:
@dev Creates a new item with the given name.
 @param _name The name of the item to create.

documentation.text:
@dev Deletes an existing item by its ID.
 @param _id The ID of the item to delete.

devdoc.details: A simple CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) contract for managing items.

createItem(string).details: Creates a new item with the given name.

params._name: The name of the item to create.

deleteItem(uint256).details: Deletes an existing item by its ID.

params._id: The ID of the item to delete.

readItem(uint256).details: Retrieves the details of an item by its ID.

params._id: The ID of the item to read.

returns._0: The details of the item (ID and name).

updateItem(uint256,string).details: Updates the name of an existing item.

params._id: The ID of the item to update.
params._newName: The new name for the item.

devdoc.title: CRUDContract
